people.name: Gerard Manley Hopkins
people.description: Gerard Manley Hopkins SJ  was an English poet, convert to Catholicism, and Jesuit priest, whose posthumous fame established him among the leading Victorian poets.

people.name: Russell Ash
people.description: Russell Ash  was the British author of the Top 10 of Everything series of books, as well as Great Wonders of the World, Incredible Comparisons and many other reference, art and humour titles, most notably his series of books on strange-but-true names, Potty, Fartwell & Knob, Busty, Slag and Nob End and  Big Pants, Burpy and Bumface.

people.name: Walter J. Boyne
people.description: Walter J.  Boyne  is a retired United States Air Force officer, Command Pilot, combat veteran, aviation historian, and author of more than 50 books and over 1,000 magazine articles.

people.name: Iyer brothers
people.description: The Iyer brothers are two twin brothers, Ramnath Iyer and Gopinath Iyer, who are veena exponents from Melbourne, Australia.

people.name: Marcus & Martinus
people.description: Marcus Gunnarsen and Martinus Gunnarsen , better known as Marcus & Martinus are two identical Norwegian twin brothers.

people.name: Paul Hartnoll
people.description: Paul Hartnoll  is one of two brothers , who make up the electronic dance act Orbital.

people.name: The Wright brothers
people.description: The Wright brothers, Orville  and Wilbur , were two American brothers, inventors, and aviation pioneers who are generally credited with inventing, building, and flying the world's first successful airplane.
